heading: Today
text: Some morning sun, then clouds spreading east. Some snow or rain showers north this afternoon.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Any snow showers north ending. Clearing and cooler.
temperature: Teens, 5 to 10 far north, 20 far south

heading: Thursday
text: Suns, mixing with some clouds. Breezy, mild.

heading: Friday
text: Rain likely, then mixing with or changing to snow after noon west.
temperature: Upper 40s and 50s, falling west to east,
